English: Sorry to call you over all of a sudden, Ryuji!
Chinese: 龍司，突然叫你過來，抱歉啊！
German:
Tut mir leid, dass ich dich so plötzlich angerufen
habe, Ryuji!

English: It's no problem. Shall we get started?
Chinese: 不會，沒問題的。要我馬上開始處理嗎？

English:
Please. The client's system is showing errors and
nothing I do seems to help...
Chinese:
拜託你了……用戶端系統發生錯誤，
我這裡完全束手無策……
Korean:
부탁할게……클라이언트 시스템에 에러가 일어나서
이게 도무지……
German:
Klar. Das System des Kunden zeigt Fehler an und
nichts hilft ...

English: It might be under attack. We'd better hurry.
Chinese: 看來可能是被攻擊了，那我就快點處理吧。
German:
Es wird vielleicht angegriffen.
Wir sollten uns beeilen.
